title: Harrison County Sheriff’s Department’s new K-9 now has a name
text: (WAVE) - We have a winner. The Harrison County Sheriff’s Department’s new K9 officer has been named “Ranger.” He’s a German short hair pointer. The department asked people to submit their favorite names on Facebook. Now that Ranger has a name, he’ll get to work getting drugs off the street and providing comfort to children during court proceedings. Copyright 2019 WAVE 3 News. All rights reserved.
